00040     public function init()
00041     {
00042         //  Call daddy
00043         parent::init();
00044 
00045         //  Set Yelp API defaults
00046         $this->requireApiQueryName = true;
00047         $this->apiQueryName = 'ywsid';
00048         $this->apiBaseUrl = 'http://api.yelp.com';
00049 
00050         //  The valid Yelp APIs to call
00051         $this->apiSubUrls =
00052             array(
00053                 self::YELP_REVIEW_API => 'business_review_search',
00054                 self::YELP_PHONE_API => 'phone_search',
00055                 self::YELP_NEIGHBORHOOD_API => 'neighborhood_search',
00056             );
00057 
00058         //  Create the base array
00059         $this->requestMap = array();
00060 
00061         //  Review API
00062         $this->addRequestMapping( 'searchTerm', 'term', false, null, self::YELP_REVIEW_API, 'boundingBox' );
00063         $this->addRequestMapping( 'maxResults', 'num_biz_requested' );
00064         $this->addRequestMapping( 'topLeftLatitude', 'tl_lat', true );
00065         $this->addRequestMapping( 'topLeftLongitude', 'tl_long', true );
00066         $this->addRequestMapping( 'bottomRightLatitude', 'br_lat', true );
00067         $this->addRequestMapping( 'bottomRightLongitude', 'br_long', true );
00068         $this->addRequestMapping( 'category' );
00069 
00070         $this->addRequestMapping( 'searchTerm', 'term', false, null, self::YELP_REVIEW_API, 'point' );
00071         $this->addRequestMapping( 'maxResults', 'num_biz_requested' );
00072         $this->addRequestMapping( 'latitude', 'lat', true );
00073         $this->addRequestMapping( 'longitude', 'long', true );
00074         $this->addRequestMapping( 'radius' );
00075         $this->addRequestMapping( 'category' );
00076 
00077         $this->addRequestMapping( 'searchTerm', 'term', false, null, self::YELP_REVIEW_API, 'location' );
00078         $this->addRequestMapping( 'maxResults', 'num_biz_requested' );
00079         $this->addRequestMapping( 'location', 'location', true );
00080         $this->addRequestMapping( 'countryCode', 'cc' );
00081         $this->addRequestMapping( 'radius' );
00082         $this->addRequestMapping( 'category' );
00083 
00084         //  Phone API
00085         $this->addRequestMapping( 'phoneNumber', 'phone', false, null, self::YELP_PHONE_API, 'number' );
00086         $this->addRequestMapping( 'countryCode', 'cc' );
00087         $this->addRequestMapping( 'category' );
00088 
00089         //  Neighborhood API
00090         $this->addRequestMapping( 'latitude', 'lat', true, null, self::YELP_NEIGHBORHOOD_API, 'point' );
00091         $this->addRequestMapping( 'longitude', 'long', true );
00092         $this->addRequestMapping( 'category' );
00093 
00094         $this->addRequestMapping( 'location', null, true, null, self::YELP_NEIGHBORHOOD_API, 'location' );
00095         $this->addRequestMapping( 'countryCode', 'cc' );
00096         $this->addRequestMapping( 'category' );
00097     }

00111     public function getReviewsByBounds( $fTLLat, $fTLLong, $fBRLat, $fBRLong, $sSearchTerm = null, $iMaxResults = 10, $sCategories = null )
00112     {
00113         $this->apiToUse = self::YELP_REVIEW_API;
00114 
00115         $this->requestData = array(
00116             'topLeftLatitude' => $fTLLat,
00117             'topLeftLongitude' => $fTLLong,
00118             'bottomRightLatitude' => $fBRLat,
00119             'bottomRightLongitude' => $fBRLong,
00120             'maxResults' => $iMaxResults,
00121         );
00122 
00123         if ( $sSearchTerm != null )
00124             $this->requestData[ 'searchTerm' ] = $sSearchTerm;
00125 
00126         if ( $sCategories != null )
00127             $this->requestData[ 'category' ] = $sCategories;
00128 
00129         return( $this->makeRequest( 'boundingBox' ) );
00130     }
00131

00201     /***
00202     * Calls the Yelp Phone API and returns results
00203     *
00204     * @param mixed $sPhone
00205     * @param mixed $sCountryCode
00206     * @param mixed $sCategories
00207     * @return mixed
00208     */
00209     public function getPhoneByNumber( $sPhone, $sCountryCode = null, $sCategories = null )
00210     {
00211         $this->apiToUse = self::YELP_PHONE_API;
00212 
00213         $this->requestData = array(
00214             'phone' => $sPhone,
00215         );
00216 
00217         if ( $sCountryCode != null )
00218             $this->requestData[ 'countryCode' ] = $sCountryCode;
00219 
00220         if ( $sCategories != null )
00221             $this->requestData[ 'category' ] = $sCategories;
00222 
00223         return( $this->makeRequest( 'number' ) );
00224     }
